p: As in the case with TGEV, appropriate biosecurity measures should be applied to avoid the introduction of PED onto farms. Present epidemiological knowledge indicates that virus is spread between farms mainly through animal and human traffic, and contaminated feed ( https://www.aphis.usda.gov/animal_health/animal_dis_spec/swine/downloads/secd_final_report.pdf). Careful disposal of the dead stock is recommended.
